Articles.Content:
I learned about this book recently and saw that there's a PDF of it online (since it hasn't been printed for a long time) here. Unfortunately, the PDF looks like gibberish for some reason.

Is there any way I can make it legible?
I have a proper version so I could send it to you, if you want...
I remember someone having this issue before. IIRC, they found that this is actually a browser issue - if you download the PDF, it might be alright.
It's your browser. Download the PDF and it should work. (I DL'd the same book from the same site and it works).
